mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sftm.itm_div VALUES( #{div_id}, 0, #{name}, #{depth}, #{upcode}, #{team_id}::bigint, 'admin', now(), 'admin', now() )
mapper.select: select div.div_id as detpth3 , div.upcode as detpth2 , div2.upcode as detpth1 from sftm.itm_div div, sftm.itm_div div2 where div.upcode = div2.div_id and div.div_id = #{div_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sftm.itm_scenario ( scenario_id, scenario_code, scenario_name, div_id, is_batch, project_id, description, reg_user, reg_date ) VALUES( #{scenario_id}::bigint, #{scenario_code}, #{scenario_name}, #{div_id}, #{is_batch}, #{project_id}::bigint, #{description}, #{cookieUserId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE sftm.itm_scenario SET scenario_name = #{scenario_name}, scenario_code = #{scenario_code}, description = #{description}, div_id = #{div_id}, is_batch = #{is_batch} WHERE scenario_id = #{scenario_id}::bigint
mapper.select:
select sc.scenario_id || '' as scenario_id, sc.scenario_code, sc.scenario_name, sc.description as scenario_desc, sc.is_batch, tc.case_id || '' as case_id, tc.case_name, tc.description as case_desc, test.user_id tester_id, test.name tester_name, team1.name tester_team, dev.user_id developer_id, dev.name developer_name, team2.name developer_team, div3.name || '-' || div2.name || '-' || div.name as div_name , sc.project_id || '-' || pr.project_name as project_id , pr.project_name from sftm.itm_scenario sc left outer join sftm.itm_test_case tc on sc.scenario_id = tc.scenario_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sftm.itm_user test ON tc.tester_id = test.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sftm.itm_team team1 ON test.team_id = team1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN sftm.itm_user dev ON tc.dev_id = dev.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sftm.itm_team team2 ON dev.team_id = team2.id LEFT OUTER JOIN sftm.itm_div div ON sc.div_id = div.div_id LEFT OUTER JOIN sftm.itm_div div2 ON div2.div_id = div.upcode LEFT OUTER JOIN sftm.itm_div div3 ON div3.div_id = div2.upcode , sftm.itm_project pr where 1=1 and pr.id = sc.project_id
AND sc.scenario_id = #{scenario_id}::bigint
ORDER BY div3.name || '-' || div2.name || '-' || div.name, sc.scenario_id

SELECT DIV3.NAME || '-' || DIV2.NAME || '-' || DIV.NAME AS div_name, DIV.DIV_id FROM SFTM.ITM_DIV DIV LEFT OUTER JOIN SFTM.ITM_DIV DIV2 ON DIV.UPCODE = DIV2.DIV_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SFTM.ITM_DIV DIV3 ON DIV2.UPCODE = DIV3.DIV_ID WHERE DIV.DEPTH = 'C'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sftm.itm_test_case VALUES( #{scenario_id}::bigint, -- scenario_id #{case_id}::bigint, -- #{case_name}, (select project_id from sftm.itm_scenario sc where scenario_id = #{scenario_id}::bigint), #{tester_id}, #{dev_id}, 'C001_01', --state #{description}, 'admin', now(), -1, 'admin', now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE sftm.itm_test_case SET case_name = #{case_name}, tester_id = #{tester_id}, dev_id = #{dev_id}, description = #{description} WHERE case_id = #{case_id}::bigint AND scenario_id = #{scenario_id}::bigint
UPDATE sftm.itm_test_case SET state = #{state} WHERE case_id = #{case_id}::bigint AND scenario_id = #{scenario_id}::bigint
mapper.select:
SELECT dv.team_id, tm.reader_id, us.user_id, us.name FROM sftm.itm_scenario sc , sftm.itm_div dv , sftm.itm_team tm , sftm.itm_user us WHERE 1=1
and sc.scenario_id = #{scenario_id}::bigint
AND sc.div_id = dv.div_id and dv.team_id = tm.id and tm.reader_id = us.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sftm.itm_comment ( id, project_id, type_code, -- t(testcase comment)/d(defect comment) case_id, defect_id, user_id, msg, use_yn, reg_user, -- 등록자 reg_date ) VALUES ( nextval('sftm.itm_comment_id_seq'::regclass), 0, #{type_code}, #{case_id}::bigint, #{defect_id}::bigint, #{cookieUserId}, #{comment}, 'y', #{cookieUserId}, now() )
mapper.select:
select cm.user_id , cm.msg , us.name , cm.reg_date , sftm.GET_WHAT_DAY(cm.reg_date) reg_date_str from sftm.itm_comment cm, sftm.itm_user us where 1=1
and cm.type_code = 't' and cm.case_id = #{case_id}::bigint
and cm.type_code = 'd' and cm.defect_id = #{defect_id}::bigint
and cm.use_yn = 'y' and cm.msg is not null and cm.user_id = us.user_id order by cm.id desc
